sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import todoContext from '../../contexts/TodoContext' const TodoItem = (props) => { const todo = props.todo const obj=useContext(todoContext) const {updateTodo}=obj return ( <>
{updateTodo(todo.id)}} style={{cursor : 'pointer'}} className="mx-2 fa-solid fa-pen">
{todo.description}
) } export default TodoItem
